# Clema

A R small dictionary based lemmatizer with emphasis in chilean spanish.

# Installation

```R
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("robsalasco/clema")
```

# Usage

```{r}
library(clema)

clema(c("carabinera","autos","ni√±as"))
```
